author: xinbenlv
content: Hi <#646778960830660623>  , I'd like to request for comment for a [EIP-5081](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5081) to add Expiration to transaction payload, [discussion](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-5081-expirable-transaction/9208) particular for you to provide feedback on the risk and solution of vulnerability of denial of service attack
